short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a cute cat at the click of a button!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds the ability to get a view a random cat image and gives you the option to download the image if you choose to.

Simply open the extension and click the 'Click for cat' button to fetch a new random image. The 'Download this cat' button saves the current image to your downloads folder.

All images are pulled from https://thecatapi.com
